website_summaries.verdict: With rustic cutout designs, this substantial fire pit is big enough for the whole family to enjoy.
pros: bowl with full diameter handle for easy transport
Includes full cover spark guard and poker
Tripod design keeps it from rocking
Heavy-duty and large enough for the whole family to sit around
Mesh-lined cutouts keep embers from escaping
cons: To help prevent corrosion and protect the ground from heat damage, put at least 10 lb
of sand in the bottom of the pit

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: We've had several fires in this pit, and we really like it. The three legs keep it from rocking (like it would if it had four legs and were placed on an uneven surface), and the ring around the pit provides a nice counterbalance to hold your skewers when roasting hot dogs. Don't forget to follow the manufacturer's instructions and put 10-12 pounds of sand in the bottom of the pit to give it a thermal buffer and prevent corrosion.
customer_reviews.author: Clifton Nolunvoid

customer_reviews.title: I was happier with a similar purchase 5 years ago from Plow ...
customer_reviews.text: the circumference of the rim is not a "perfect" of enough circle to accept the hand rails. They were simply impossible to attach because of the "off" measurements of the "circular" rim. Also, when resting the spark guard on top .... it was obvious that the dimensions are goofy because one side of the pit had a 1 inch gap that it could not cover. The cover also seems very poorly made and flimsy. Overall, I was happier with a similar purchase 5 years ago from Plow and Hearth. I sent this back. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Book-Loving Mom

customer_reviews.title: Went together well; too early to tell on durability
customer_reviews.text: Product assembled pretty easily. There are no holes on the bottom, so if left out, this will fill with rain and ultimately rust out (like my prior firepit). You can easily drill through the metal and add some drainage holes. The directions suggest keeping this firepit out of the elements - like you want to bring this into your garage once used! Time will tell on durability, but I like it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Connecticut Cowboy

customer_reviews.title: Good construction, great size, good value.
customer_reviews.text: This fire pit is perfectly satisfactory, shipping speed and delivery excellent. The only complaint I have is not really the fault of the complaint; it's a function of physics. The screen cover is kinda flimsy. But it serves it's purpose just fine. I do recommend this huge pit; I've had a large group of friends over and we all fit around it beautifully. I'm quite pleased. I wish they'd included a cover but i'm not too upset about that. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Callihan

customer_reviews.title: Its a great size for the whole family to sit around
customer_reviews.text: Our Family loves it. Its a great size for the whole family to sit around. Seems to be an excellent quality. I also bought the Classic Accessories 55-198-012401-EC Hickory Heavy Duty Round Fire Pit Cover, Large to keep it protected and it fit great.
customer_reviews.author: jason hamilton

customer_reviews.title: This is the one to buy...
customer_reviews.text: We searched a lot and decided to buy this Landmann Super Sky - 15 years ago!!! Today, after 6 moves and outdoor in weather conditions from Washington to Wisconsin to Texas...this fire pit has lasted and we love it even more today. It hasn't rusted out and remains sturdy. If you are trying to decide which one to get - this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: RGan

customer_reviews.title: The best darn pit out there
customer_reviews.text: I bought a new one after I accidentally ran over my first one with a truck. It was so sad. The thing is built out of metal so heavy that I could not bend, sledge, or jack the thing back into reasonable shape and use it. You can fill it with wood and still carry it around easily with the handles on the side. It looks great. It's the largest diameter thing out there for the money, which makes using wood of varying sizes easier. What a great thing. I've used it in the woods as well as the patio.
customer_reviews.author: FIllC

customer_reviews.title: My first one was four years old and still in great shape except for the spark screen
customer_reviews.text: This is my second fire pit from Landmann. My first one was four years old and still in great shape except for the spark screen. I purchased a new one to get the spark screen. I am very happy with this fire pit! It has met all of my expectations. The pit itself is built very tough and can withstand high heat from fires.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Pranga

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Fire Pit
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality fire pit. It is heavy duty steel. I followed the directions and put sand across the bottom to help protect the base from heat and rusting out. I first drilled a 1/4 hole in the bottom and cover it with a rock before adding the sand to allow water to drain out.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: This is our 2nd landmann Super Sky Fire Pit. Works well, with good air circulation. Sturdy construction. Nice large size for burning brush and longer fire wood pieces. Other companies offer better covers for the pit, that last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: This is one of my best purchases. One of my favorite summer activity is ...
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my best purchases. One of my favorite summer activity is marshmallows with a campfire. This pit makes it safe with the mesh cover. Sitting around this can get toasty on a chilly evening. No flying embers. It's very sturdy construction and hefty in weight. Easy to put together. It's doing well many years later.
customer_reviews.author: jmumv

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fire pit - but cover too small
customer_reviews.text: Great looking fire pit! Unfortunately, the cover is 2" too short in diameter to fit the top of the pit. Rather than returning it, I plan to rig it someone, perhaps adding bolts to top of pit to hold the cover. I also will drill a couple small holes in the bottom so rain doesn't build up if cover I bought separately isn't on it, and I ordered a grate to place on bottom so the wood sits just above bottom of pit and allows for better air circulation. If I wasn't so handy, I would have returned it and given it 2-3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Smilee

customer_reviews.title: Good choice.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty big fire pit. This thing is big. Enough room to make a good size camp fire in the back yard with plenty of space for family and friends to gather around. The part I like is that with another person you can move it to where you need/want it. So your not stuck with a fire pit in the middle of your back yard, and kids have room to play.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to use plenty of sand in the bottom
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Finish looks like red automotive primer paint, not copper. Stars and moons make a neat effect. Will handle pretty good size fires. For safety's sake, be sure to use the wire mesh cover. Use plenty of sand in the bottom; it will hold the heat better and keep the fire going until all the wood has burned. Be aware that it takes two people to move it from place to place unless you want to just drag it. And I don't recommend doing that unless you want to break off the legs. Looks like it's going to stand up to regular use for some time. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde V Stutzman

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome firepit. It's huge, and that's just what I wanted. My wife and I had it together in just a few minutes, because it was so easy to do. Pros: Large capacity. Easy to put together. Very well built. A cooling ring around the circumference to protect from accidentally rubbing your leg up against the pit. Nice long tool for easy lid removal. A screen covering the stars and moon openings. Cons: You have to drill a quarter inch hole in the bottom so that water doesn't accumulate when it rains.
customer_reviews.author: Ubgoodnow

customer_reviews.title: This item is a heavy weight item and should last many years.
customer_reviews.text: I have been very pleased with not only the fire pit but also the quick response from Amason. I received my order in a day and a half through UPS and one of their very helpful drivers who assisted in butting the cartel in the backyard for me. The pit was easy to assemble and more than met my expection. I did have to drill a drain hole in antisapition of the many rainy day here in Ma. . I would suggest that the company take the few seconds it would take to add this feature to their already great item Len
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Mach

customer_reviews.title: God designed this Fire Pit
customer_reviews.text: Searched all the big box stores and small local fireplace stores. Nothing compared to this. The size is bigger, the hook is thick and sturdy. The top is awesome. Used for our wedding reception and now sits in the back yard. No cover. The top has some small surface rust but I spray it with some paint every now and then and its good as new. The base area is great, the stars and moon shapes cast light everywhere. All my neighbors have complimented it. I am now buying them off amazon and marking them up 100%. Really though, if you see this review and don't purchase this I would love to know why.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Bullet

customer_reviews.title: so this is the best firepit out there for this price
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so this is the best firepit out there for this price. I got it for my husband and he loves it! The only con is that it's not exactly easy to clean out the ashes.
customer_reviews.author: Dagan T.

customer_reviews.title: Super Great!
customer_reviews.text: Super awesome! I use it all the time. Like other people wrote, I put sand in the bottom but I didn't drill holes. I bought a cover to protect from rain. I would recommend this one due to the size. Others for just a little less $ are way smaller and wouldn't support the logs I'm burning!
customer_reviews.author: Christiana

customer_reviews.title: Love this fire pit!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I purchased the Landmann USA 28905 for our anniversary this year. We have absolutely loved this product. It was easy to assemble out of the box and we love the way it looks. Let me just tell you that this product is huge! This was the main reason we decided to buy this fire pit and it is so nice to be able to have such a large fire. If you are looking for a fire pit that is double the size of almost any other fire pit out there...you found the right product.
customer_reviews.author: JLa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and style for our backyard
customer_reviews.text: We love this fire pit. We have put it to good use and it is holding up. There is some wear on the barrel but that doesn't surprise me. The only issue we have had with the product is the wood "prod" that comes with the pit. It comes in two pieces and ours broke not long after getting the pit. We still use it, but only half! Not too safe as the fire is hot and my hand gets too close to the flames. The pit, however, is great.
customer_reviews.author: F.S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, large, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We love backyard fires and this large fire pit was perfect for a family reunion. It went together in about 10 minutes. putting A few inches of sand in the bottom makes a big difference in insulating the bottom and we bought a large cover for it. The paint did not peel or darken, the cut outs are nicely screened and look great. My sister is now getting one for her yard.
customer_reviews.author: L. Gundersen

customer_reviews.title: Great value, price, and delivery time!
customer_reviews.text: We love the new fire pit! Awesome price and bigger than our old one! We have used it several times already are very happy with it! Quick delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bigger is better. This 1 is about 1 foot bigger in diameter then the smaller version.
customer_reviews.text: I had a smaller version and this is much better. It holds logs that burn all night. No more feeding the fire everey 20 minutes. Build quality is good. My old one was better, 1 piece. This one requires assembly of the feet. ring guard, the inner posts and the hook. The hook is only good for lifting the cover. A fire poker is still needed.
customer_reviews.author: Dade072

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product for $50 less on Amazon than both Lowe's and Home Depot were advertising. It was delivered ahead of schedule and very easy to assemble. I was missing two screws but called the company and they shipped them out to me same day! Their customer service was excellent and we were able to roast marshmallows and make s'mores much to the delight of my daughters. You will need to purchase about 25 lbs of sand before your first use.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Joyce Hogan

customer_reviews.title: We were really pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: We were really pleased with this purchase. It is nice and large and the cut outs on the side make the experience even more enjoyable as we watch the firelight dance inside.
customer_reviews.author: Workinglaurie

customer_reviews.title: Best Firepit Ever
customer_reviews.text: This firepit has been amazing ever since I bought it. We have had fires with the wood stacked over five feet high and stacked around the outside of the ring and the pit never fails us. I would high recommend this pit to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Joseph

customer_reviews.title: One bundle from the local grocery store or sports store looks like nothing once you add it to this pit
customer_reviews.text: Well built pit...its BIG. This pit holds a lot of wood. One bundle from the local grocery store or sports store looks like nothing once you add it to this pit.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one, one for each home, I wouldn’t of bought it again if I didn’t think it was truly worth it.
customer_reviews.author: HypoxicDrive98103

customer_reviews.title: Well built fire pit
customer_reviews.text: After looking at several fire pits sold at local home improvement stores, I was not impressed with the thickness of the metal they were made of or the physical size. I found this one on Amazon and through further research, I found it to have great reviews and it had the specs that I was looking for. It was very easy to put together and it actually feels like it was made to have a fire in it unlike some of the others that I looked at. We have had several nice fires in it and really enjoy it. I would recommend buying this fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: AZDBackfan

customer_reviews.title: Can't enjoy winter without it!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Super Sky Fire Pit. The first one lasted 2 years, and lots of abuse. We keep it outside year long without a cover (had to drill a few holes in the bottom to allow the rain water to drain). Have burned everything from yard trash to waste lumber. But our favorite fires come from burning good ol' oak logs. Lots of big, hot fires. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cross

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars but..
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars but was very difficult to put outer rings on. Once i did get them on, (after practically killing myself to get the pieces to interlock and align with screw holes) it is very sturdy and well made. Very nice looking and love the big size. I will be adding a few drill holes for drainage later on.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Wagner

customer_reviews.title: HUGE
customer_reviews.text: Gigantic but nicely made. If you are purchasing it for small-medium backyard fires then I'd get a smaller size. For big fires you'd need a lot of wood but this would be perfect for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Bbams

customer_reviews.title: Overall a very nice fire pit
customer_reviews.text: Thicker steel than some of the other fire pits. Large diameter pit and will fit some fairly long logs. I think if you keep it out of the rain, it should last a long time. All parts included to get it put together. Some of the screws were free floating in the very large box, should have been packaged where they wouldn't come loose. Luckily they were all still in the box. Overall a very nice fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: johnny332

customer_reviews.title: Large, pretty, and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy. We can move the fire pit easily with two people. The size is perfect and we’ve had several fires already.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Gridley

customer_reviews.title: Super Sky Fire Pit
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Super fire pit! everything was as expected, works very well. Looks great! Delivered in a timely fashion. I would recommend to others to purchase. Cons: Made of sheet metal, not heavy steel. Will rust/burn out if not maintained properly. A cover of some kind will need to be used to keep water out.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne C

customer_reviews.title: Great big fire pit!
customer_reviews.text: This was the biggest, nicest fire pit we found. Great for entertaining a group outside. Has a protective metal ring around the wall of the pit so that you don't lean against the hot wall. Can't wait until it gets cooler so that we can use it more.
customer_reviews.author: J. P. Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this firepit for a family reunion. It was perfect large enough for everyone to get around. Many comments from the family on how nice the screen was, as no sparks were able to reach the people around the pit. I did drill a hole in the bottom so water can drain in the hopes it will not rust. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Montana

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong piece
customer_reviews.text: I like it but one of the arms that goes around the outside is the wrong piece (it doesn't have a male and female end to click in). How can I get a replacement? Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Lee Shainis

customer_reviews.title: Just go ahead and shell out for the high temp ...
customer_reviews.text: Just go ahead and shell out for the high temp paint. Otherwise it does the job. wish the bowl were a little deeper
customer_reviews.author: RUCKUS

customer_reviews.title: great fire pit
customer_reviews.text: We love this fire pit. The fire makes the cut outs of the moon and stars dance at night and the large size really makes the kids feel like they are camping. We don't put the top on it while we are having a fire. The kids roast marshmallows and make smores and look forward to the treat of having a fire right here at home.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Kindler!

customer_reviews.title: Went together quite easy and fast
customer_reviews.text: Put it together but haven't used it yet. Went together quite easy and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Gaudet

customer_reviews.title: Aweaome Firepit - highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great firepit for us - we can burn small or large fires and it handles both equally well. Very sturdy construction and looks great at night with a fire burning - the moon and star cutouts really look nice! I highly recommend this to anyone who needs something to handle fires of varying sizes and to anyone who needs something that can be portable. We have been extremely pleased with this fire pit!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Schiltz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome big Pit.
customer_reviews.text: Used it a few times works great! Was easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Ahamed Sahulhameed

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces!
customer_reviews.text: So it’s pretty cute and a nice size, but we got it with 3 screws missing, so that’s pretty annoying. I’ll go to the hardware store to get what’s missing and it’ll be fine, but y’know products should come with all their parts!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Fire in the Hole
customer_reviews.text: It's a great little fire pit that will hold a big fire. I would recommend lining the bottom with some fire brick. If you do that it'll last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Kayaksurfer

customer_reviews.title: Love the fire pit
customer_reviews.text: Love the fire pit. Had 5 years. Does get a little rusty from sitting outside all the time, but overall is solid.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Had first few bonfires and we're pleased. It would be nice if it were a ...
customer_reviews.text: Had first few bonfires and we're pleased. It would be nice if it were a few inches higher off the ground.
customer_reviews.author: J G

customer_reviews.title: Nice big fire ring
customer_reviews.text: Nice big fire ring. Coating is decent. 4 stars because it would have been better to have 4 legs instead of 3 in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: This fire pit is amazing! It's nice and big and I used it ...
customer_reviews.text: This fire pit is amazing! It's nice and big and I used it at a party I had recently. There were easily 15 people sitting around this, comfortably enjoying the fire and making s'mores! I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Denault

customer_reviews.title: Not what it used to be, cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this same firepit about 5 years ago, and was happy with it though the cover disintegrated after 2 years. I purchased this one hoping to have the same quality. It is not. the metal hoop around the outside is not longer thick and sturdy. It seems this company (not the seller) has cheapened everything they can about the product to cut costs. Yet maintained the high price, and separated out the cover as an extra. Not sure how many the seasons this will last... the cover lasted less than 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: TEX-reviews

customer_reviews.title: Huge!
customer_reviews.text: This firepit was totally solid and awesome. It was just way to big for our yard. I thought was bigger was better in this situation but this one is too big for a small backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Cole Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Had to drill a few holes at bottom so water from rain could drain ou, easy to put together! Nice and big!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rugged Fire Pit
customer_reviews.text: So far, we have used this 3 times since setting it up. Perfect size. Very Sturdy. Didn't blow away or move in strong storm.
customer_reviews.author: lovemykindle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Solidly built fire pit. Easy to assemble. Does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: TW990

customer_reviews.title: Great value! I am very happy with this and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great value! I am very happy with this and will drill my own drain holes. Nice, large format, fire pit and well made for the money.
customer_reviews.author: craig watson

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS! The size is great
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS! The size is great, it fits so much more than the regular size! Great quality. Perfect addition to our backyard and still complies with town code.
customer_reviews.author: Puff Momma

customer_reviews.title: it was easy to set up and have been using it in ...
customer_reviews.text: Received the item very quickly, it was easy to set up and have been using it in the backyard every since ! I highly recommend this product !
customer_reviews.author: DonovanMaker

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Big
customer_reviews.text: I keep this out in the middle of my yard. Have hosted several cookouts and fire gatherings over the past couple of years. Able to build a nice size blaze in this thing. Also looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Easy to assemble, no pieces missing or damaged. I have used it several times since its arrival and totally enjoy it every time. Would definitely purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Huge, wonderful for parties, allowed in my city
customer_reviews.text: Great fire pit that is actually big enough to use. Not like the tiny ones that only allow 12" pieces of firewood. Makes for a great city-legal fire pit to enjoy in the Summer months.
customer_reviews.author: Chizzle

customer_reviews.title: Nice and big
customer_reviews.text: Nice and big...easily portable! Haven't really used the cover but it looks nice. Look forward to many back yard campfires!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Pit
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. Wanted a big fire pit, not the small ones you see in your local Lowe's, etc....this thing does the job!!! Nice wide pit allows for a HUGE fire if you want. The vented sides really allow oxygen to get to the flame. Construction is solid, finish looks great. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: CAS

customer_reviews.title: Wire top rusts quick & looks bad.
customer_reviews.text: This is very large and the family loves having campfires and making smores. Wire top rusts quick & looks bad.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing, very big, makes great fires.. 8-10people no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper power

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and large!
customer_reviews.text: Most fire pits are way too small, this one is huge! I'm incredibly happy with it! It's very well made and I love the detailing on the side. It looks just like the picture. It's perfect for a large fire!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Ulrich

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Looks nice, big size is awesome and you can build a nice size fire for a super chilly night! :) Enjoy! I bought a cover too ... I would like to have it a long time
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Went together easily, is sturdy and the cut out areas on the side allows for good air circulation. It's also nice to watch the burning coals through the cutouts.
customer_reviews.author: midsis7

customer_reviews.title: Well made and very attractive. Goes well with stone patios.
customer_reviews.text: Big enough for a decent fire that will last several hours with real wood. I ended up drilling a hole for draining. Make sure you put sand on bottom to protect your patio from too much heat. I have a flagstone patio around my pool. I like it a lot better than artificial gas fireplaces. Something about a real fire makes the experience so much more cozier. I would give it 5 starts but one of the three fire shield screws was not threaded. Ended up buying a machine screw at Home Depot. My wife called the seller but surprising they didn't just send her a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: A. Pangelinan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended. Large size is safer and supports and sanely sized backyard fire.
customer_reviews.author: R to the D

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: The fire pit was above my expectations. Craftsmanship is excellent and sturdy. I look forward to using it a lot this coming year.
customer_reviews.author: Momabear

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is huge. You will go through alot of wood in a nite if you want to. Well built.
customer_reviews.author: RAZZ

customer_reviews.title: Firepit missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to receiving the firepit, but was disappointed when it arrived missing several small parts. I contacted customer service. They were quite friendly and assured me that the parts would be put in the mail. I did receive one of the items that I stated was missing but it was damaged, then another one came in the mail that was not. I never did get any of the nuts and bolts required to attach the ring to the firepit.
customer_reviews.author: SJ Silver

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This pit is similar, but better than my old pit. I got 5 years out of the old one before it rusted through. This one has thicker metal. Same design but more metal.
customer_reviews.author: Boss

customer_reviews.title: Nice product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: this is nice, large fire pit! nothing was damaged during shipping, and all parts were included.
customer_reviews.author: Christie H

customer_reviews.title: Great fire pit!
customer_reviews.text: Fire pit is an awesome size! Had 10+ people around it, roasting marshmallows. Super easy assembly and sturdy. We've only used it a handful of times so far but we are very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Seiter

customer_reviews.title: ... used this for two seasons now and I absolutely LOVE it. I took the advice of other reviewers ...
customer_reviews.text: We've used this for two seasons now and I absolutely LOVE it. I took the advice of other reviewers and drilled holes in the bottom for it to drain in the event it got water / rain, etc. We USE this fire pit a lot during the fall and it is covered during the winter months but left outside. I will certainly buy another one when it comes time to and would / have recommend(ed) this fire pit to anyone looking for one.
customer_reviews.author: Pacosmom

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: My dad was going to purchase another fire pit from Cabelas but I told him to check Amazon first. He found this unit & it was the same size but much cheaper. He bought this one & we have used it quite a few times. It's very sturdy & appears to be made well.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Bierbaum

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: we love this firepit! We have a lot of fires...
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Van Hootegem

customer_reviews.title: So Far So God
customer_reviews.text: It took me a long time to find the perfect pit for my family. This is so pretty and functional! It was easy to put together and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Price-mora

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Fire Pit
customer_reviews.text: Was EXTREMELY pleased with my new fire pit....my children couldn't wait to use it on Christmas night...sturdy and quite pleasing to the eye. Quick delivery and easy to assemble...Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Owens-Burke

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product, larger than I expected but that was a plus. good build quality. very difficult to assemble. Better prices elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Edelson

customer_reviews.title: This fire pit is awesome. We all love sitting around it at night
customer_reviews.text: This fire pit is awesome. We all love sitting around it at night. Great size and very well built. Way better than anything I saw at the box stores, and at a much better price point. Do make sure and buy a bag of sand to put into the bottom before you light a fire in it. The ground underneath gets crazy hot and it will scorch anything under it without the sand to deflect the heat up. one bag will do. I also bought the cover, which fits perfect and is great because we are in Louisiana and it rains a lot here.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Voivedich

customer_reviews.title: Great fire pit!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our vacation home and couldn't be happier. Weighs about 60# and got Next Day Air Fedex shipping for $3.99 with Amazon Prime. Arrived in perfect shape.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fire pit!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, well made, and is big enough for a nice sized bonfire. This cover fits well: Classic Accessories 55-198-012401-EC Hickory Heavy Duty Round Fire Pit Cover, Large The suggested cover did not fit...
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: this easy to assemble firepit is exactly what I had expected. Nice combination of price point, form and function. Highly recommend for the price conscious pyromaniac in all of us!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karl Latham

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our daughter who lives with lots of snow in the winter. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: this is a really nice fire pit for the money. The size is bigger than most and this is our second one. The first one lasted for 5 years or so.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: roast marshmellos in city cool
customer_reviews.text: nice size had 5 city kids roasten hot dogs and marsmallows in tiny yard very nice and don't know who enjoyed it more me or kids very nice pit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't be Fooled..  This is not made in the USA!
customer_reviews.text: The quality seems good but very disappointed how Landmann wants you to think that their products are made in the USA. I bought this as a gift for my father who is a fanatic when it comes to buying everything he can made in the USA. I was going to be extra proud buying him this and pointing out that its made in the USA. O'well, so much for that. Has made in China all over the box. I suspect if the company name was "Landmann China" there wouldn't be quite as many people buying their product.
customer_reviews.author: Troy G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For the price this thing is a great deal. Glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: You will enjoy relaxing next to a fire at night.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Quality fire pit
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this fire pit since 2010 and I have to say it still looks great and held up very well. The bottom is still in great shape. Any assembly issues others have mentioned are operator error. They apparently didn't know how to put it together. I purchased a cover for it to keep the weather off of it. The best money I have spent on a well made fire pit! Don't settle for less! Don't buy a cheap one. Enough said, our family loves it.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for my camp in Maine. Its well made and very pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price for functionality and setting an atmosphere
customer_reviews.text: This is well designed, very functional, and the moon and stars motif add a cozy campfire atmosphere
customer_reviews.author: Steven W. Funderburg

customer_reviews.title: Great fire pit
customer_reviews.text: Good size and easy to put legs on. Also bought the cover. My friends loved the light that comes through the patterned body...
customer_reviews.author: Judy Wilk

customer_reviews.title: Stop Here...don't buy a different fire pit
customer_reviews.text: The cover and the fire pit are top quality. We love ours and did as reviewers suggested by spray painting the inside drum and top with high heat grill paint and adding sand to the bottom. Its a very sturdy fire pit and we are enjoying very much. Highly recommend this as a great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: GML

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, easy purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Ihad been looking for a bigger fie pit for over a year when I decided to look over the websites and this was spot on. easy purchasing process and timely delivery, 3 days, and in excellent condition. Fire pit just as advertised with easy assembly and sturdy assembly. A bit expensive but really worth it
customer_reviews.author: Cochise86

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our friend has the smaller version of this fire pit and we love it. When we saw that it also came in a larger size we decided to get it. We absolutely LOVE LOVE LOVE IT!!! We have block parties throughout the year and this fire pit will work out just great!!! Word of advice, do not purchase the Veranda 44" fire pit cover that is pictured with this fire pit. It DOES NOT fit. It barely fits over the ring at the upper part of the pit. The cover would definitely fit the Big Sky (smaller version of the Super Sky) Fire Pit.
customer_reviews.author: Diddy

customer_reviews.title: Rusts.  Suggested Cover,
customer_reviews.text: Rusts, the top screen fell apart in the first year. The screen from the Stars and Moon shapes fell out after getting rusted. Had to drill a hole in the bottom. If your going to want to keep this for many years, I would suggest a cover or tarp. I'm just going to replace it after It becomes too rusted.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

product_meta.title: Landmann USA 28905 Super Sky Fire Pit
product_meta.description: Style:Fire PitThe Super Sky Fire Pit has unique and stylish cutouts which create an incredible ambience at night. Offers 360 degree view of fire with 40% more burn/cooking space than the regular big sky firepits. Black spark screen and poker included.
feature_bullets: Sturdy Steel Construction designed for easy assembly
Large 36" Diameter bowl with full diameter handle for easy transport
Includes Full Cover Spark Guard & poker
Sturdy Steel Construction designed for easy assembly
Large 36" Diameter bowl with full diameter handle for easy transport
Includes Full Cover Spark Guard & poker
